name: stream-ingestion
description: efficient, backpressure-aware ingestion and delivery of large data streams.

scripts.test:all: npm run build && npm run build:test && node -e "const fs=require('node:fs'); const path=require('node:path'); const dir=path.join('dist-tests','tests'); const files=fs.readdirSync(dir).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.js')); if(!files.length){ console.error('No test files found in '+dir); process.exit(1);} for (const f of files){ require(path.resolve(dir,f)); }"
